fullText: Cherry Jones gives a towering performance as Amanda Wingfield, the delusional Southern belle who refuses to accept that her children have minds of their own.
dtliExcerpt: Cherry Jones gives a towering performance as Amanda Wingfield, the delusional Southern belle who refuses to accept that her children have minds of their own.
